titleStmt.title: The perfection of the evangelical revelation, a sermon preached at St. Martins in the Fields, Nov. 4. 1695 being the eighth and last of the lecture for that year, founded by the honourable Robert Boyle, Esquire / by John Williams ...
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill, senr & junr ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Half title: Dr William's last sermon at Mr. Boyle's lecture, 1695.
